description:
The kingdom has been infiltrated by a girl named Ren from the Assassin`s Guild.. Upon learning of her special ability as the Poison Blighted, Lloyd tracks her back to her hideout, sneaks in, and is attacked by a group of assassins with unique abilities.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m Going to Battle Some Assassins
暗殺者たちとバトルします
